If haven't played Portal 2, then I guess you haven't played Portal 1 either.

WHY?

Portal and Portal 2 are - without a doubt - two of the most brilliant games ever made. Where Portal shines in game mechanics, Portal 2 expands with cool new ideas. Both games know how to do a tutorial without the player noticing it. And in fact, both teach you the mechanics almost completely throughout the game. Visually it has aged very well. simplistic, but still amazing in scale and scenery, Portal 2 still makes you go "wow". 
I replay Portal 1&2 regularly about once a year, and I am still not bored by it. These games are up there with Doom, Tetris, Mario, Sonic and many more of the "games that you should have played". It's like Lord of the Rings. If you haven't read or watched that, you're missing out on a true classic.

Follow my curator at https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28337205-Fair-Minded-Witness/

On m'avait conseillé de jouer à ce jeu et je ne suis pas déçu ! Entre les tests à résoudre et le cynisme omniprésent, on ne s'ennuie pas ! Portal 2 n'est pas tout jeune, 9 ans déjà, et il a pourtant super bien vieilli. Évidemment on n'a pas des shaders de Triple A, mais ils auraient été plus gênant qu'autre chose dans ces souterrains. Si vous ne l'avez pas déjà essayé, foncez !

Este jogo é fenomenal, um dos melhores que já joguei. Nele você vai encontrar puzzles desafiadores, gráficos lindos e uma história bastante imersiva e bem humorada. O modo multi-player é extremamente divertido e vai te arrancar muita risada. No geral, é um jogo simplesmente magnífico e vale cada centavo. Recomendadíssimo!!!
